text:
“It’s all slander and nonsense!”  
Lebeziatnikov gasps, eyes wide.  

“I was defending myself! She attacked first!”  

“Pushed her back! It’s self-defense!”  

---  

“He-he-he!” Luzhin chuckles, smirking.  

“You’re just grumpy! It’s nonsense!”  

“Women should be equal, even in strength!”  

---  

“Fighting is unthinkable in future society!”  
Lebeziatnikov frowns, deep in thought.  

“I won’t attend those ridiculous dinners!”  

“Priests would make it worth my while!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Lebeziatnikov defends his actions against a woman while discussing the complexities of gender equality and societal conventions.
